responses: The school hours are from 8:00 AM to 3:00 PM.
The school is located at [SCHOOL_ADDRESS].
You can contact the school at [SCHOOL_PHONE_NUMBER].
The school offers various facilities including a library, sports complex, and science labs.
Our mission is to provide quality education and holistic development to students.
You can find the school calendar on our website at [SCHOOL_CALENDAR_LINK].

The admission deadline is [ADMISSION_DEADLINE].
Yes, there is an entrance exam for admission to [GRADE/CLASS].
The admission form can be downloaded from [ADMISSION_FORM_LINK].
Yes, you can apply online through our admissions portal: [ADMISSIONS_PORTAL_LINK].

responses: Yes, the school provides transportation services.

There is an additional fee for transportation, which is detailed at [TRANSPORTATION_FEES_LINK].

Yes, you can track the school bus using our tracking app: [BUS_TRACKING_APP_LINK].

patterns: What health services are available at school?

How does the school handle medical emergencies?
Are there any health screenings?
Where can I find the health policy?
What should I do if my child is sick?
responses: The school provides basic health services and has a nurse on-site.
Our safety protocols include regular drills, security personnel, and emergency plans.
In case of medical emergencies, our staff is trained to provide first aid and contact emergency services.
We conduct annual health screenings and vaccinations.
The health policy can be reviewed on our website at [HEALTH_POLICY_LINK].
If your child is sick, please inform the school office and provide a medical certificate upon their return.
